meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Freda Mammina Ouida Rellstab Tom Welter Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1142.

td.p: Freda Mammina, a teacher from Yonkers, New York
Ouida Rellstab, a teacher from New Orleans, Louisiana
Tom Welter, a quality controller from Anaheim, California

tr.td: FIRST LADIES
TUNES OF THE '20s
FLORIDA
SMOKING
OLD TESTAMENT
MISSING LINKS
(Alex: We will provide you with probably 2/3 of the equation, you have to supply that missing element.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '1950s first lady who was so fond of pink that in her day the White House was called "the Pink Palace"')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: 1950s first lady who was so fond of pink that in her day the White House was called "the Pink Palace"
